org.mozilla.geckoview

Class ContentBlocking

  • Object
    • org.mozilla.geckoview.ContentBlocking

  • @AnyThread
public class ContentBlocking
extends Object
    Content Blocking API to hold and control anti-tracking, cookie and Safe Browsing settings.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ContentBlocking.BlockEvent
      Holds content block event details.
      static interface  ContentBlocking.Delegate
      GeckoSession applications implement this interface to handle content blocking events.
      static class  ContentBlocking.Settings 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int AT_AD
      Block advertisement trackers.
      static int AT_ANALYTIC
      Block analytics trackers.
      static int AT_CONTENT
      Block content trackers.
      static int AT_CRYPTOMINING
      Block cryptocurrency miners.
      static int AT_DEFAULT
      Block ad, analytic, social and test trackers.
      static int AT_SOCIAL
      Block social trackers.
      static int AT_STRICT
      Block all known trackers.
      static int AT_TEST
      Block Gecko test trackers (used for tests).
      static int CB_DEFAULT
      Recommended content blocking categories.
      static int CB_STRICT
      Strict content blocking categories.
      static int COOKIE_ACCEPT_ALL
      Accept first-party and third-party cookies and site data.
      static int COOKIE_ACCEPT_FIRST_PARTY
      Accept only first-party cookies and site data to block cookies which are not associated with the domain of the visited site.
      static int COOKIE_ACCEPT_NON_TRACKERS
      Accept only first-party and non-tracking third-party cookies and site data to block cookies which are not associated with the domain of the visited site set by known trackers.
      static int COOKIE_ACCEPT_NONE
      Do not store any cookies and site data.
      static int COOKIE_ACCEPT_VISITED
      Accept first-party and third-party cookies and site data only from sites previously visited in a first-party context.
      static int COOKIE_LIFETIME_DAYS
      Limit cookie lifetime to N days.
      static int COOKIE_LIFETIME_NORMAL
      Accept default cookie lifetime.
      static int COOKIE_LIFETIME_RUNTIME
      Downgrade cookie lifetime to this runtime's lifetime.
      static int NONE 
      static int SB_ALL
      Block all unsafe sites.
      static int SB_HARMFUL
      Block harmful sites.
      static int SB_MALWARE
      Block malware sites.
      static int SB_PHISHING
      Block phishing sites.
      static int SB_UNWANTED
      Block unwanted sites.

        public static final int CB_DEFAULT

        public static final int CB_STRICT
        Strict content blocking categories. A combination of AT_STRICT and SB_ALL. May cause issues with some web sites.
